text: Riau is a province of Indonesia. It is on the central eastern coast of Sumatra. Its capital city is Pekanbaru. Riau is rich in natural resources.Lesley Potter; et al., The Effects of Indonesia's Decentralisation on Forest and Estate Crops in Riau Province (Bogor: Center for International Forestry Research, 2001), p. 17 It has petroleum, natural gas, rubber, and palm oil. == References == Category:Provinces of Indonesia Category:Sumatra
title: Riau
